roleset.name: matching in size, shape, or some other measurement

example.name: symmetric-j: arg1
example.text: These vessels are all patent and perfusion of the kidneys is symmetric .

example.name: symmetric-j: args 1, 3
example.text: Determine whether the graph of y = | x | + 3 is symmetric with respect to the origin , the x - axis , or the y - axis .

propbank.arg: with respect to the origin , the x - axis , or the y - axis

example.name: symmetric-j: args 1, 3
example.text: Kidneys are symmetric in size with minimal focal areas of cortical thinning in both kidneys .

propbank.arg: with minimal focal areas of cortical thinning in both kidneys

example.name: symmetric-j
example.text: now build the leg on the other side of the red block , symmetric to the first leg
example.amr: (b / build-01 :mode imperative :ARG0 (y / you) :ARG1 (l / leg) :location (s / space :ARG1-of (n / next-to-02 :ARG2 (b2 / block :color (r / red)))) :manner (s2 / symmetric-01 :ARG1 l :ARG2 (l2 / leg :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))))

roleset.note: SYMMETRIC NOTES: Updated for SpatialAMR. AMR examples for 'asymmetric' found in the asymmetric.xml file, but MSAMR will pull roles from this file.
